summary: As the title says, a simple attempt to add some of Ordinator's perks back to the alchemy tree
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][u][size=5]What this does[/size]

[/u][/b]Add some of Ordinator's perks back to the alchemy tree with some minor perk edits. Left out perks that rely on other perks which have been overwritten by CACO[/center][center][u][b][size=5]Installation[/size]
[/b][/u]
Drop the esp into the Data folder in the Skyrim Directory or use NMM

[b][u][size=5]Load Order[/size]

[/u][/b]Ordinator - Perks of Skyrim
...
Complete Alchemy & Cooking Overhaul.esp
CACO - Ordinator.esp

[size=5][b][u]Recommended
[/u][/b][/size]
Grab ServantofSin'sÂ [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70272/?]CACO-Ordinatored[/url] main file for compatiblity fixes

[u][b][size=5]Perk Added and Perk Changes[/size]

[/b][/u]Stimulants - Requires CACO's Physician and 30 alchemy
Elemental Oil
Alchemist's Cookbook
Alkahest - Requires 60 Alchemy and Poisoner
World Serpent - Requires Concentrated Poison or Purity
That Which Does Not Kill You - Requires Catalyst or Chymist


[size=5][u][b]Credits[/b][/u][/size]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3959191/?]Enai Siaion[/url] - Creator of [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68425/?]Ordinator[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4291352/?]kryptopyr[/url] - Creator of [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69306/?]Complete Alchemy and Cooking Overhaul[/url]
Bethesda - Skyrim[/center]
author: kon12
